data.text: @millyredpath @pax What specifically are you citing from the documents. Saying "the documents" is not citing your source.
@HurrImBurry @RVGNJ @mbalzano523 @pax Yes. Also disgusting how people will say *only* the sick or elderly will die, as if their lives are less important than the rest of the population's convenience.
@patksullivan @pax The virus has mutated quite a few times in the last year. A booster is a good idea.

@H2OAcidic @pax For now yes. But as we have learned from 2020 and 2021 policy and procedures can change on a dime. As I said who knows what the rules will look like at PAX. Who knows what it will look like by the time pax happens. Absolutely follow the rules but itâ€™s possible rules could change

@mcgreevytweets Ya right. I don't suffer fools, true but that's about it.

Granted there's a ton on here. You come at me, I come at you. Period.
@MiniaturesMan @CamiloS27367449 @pax Sure do. I use whatever pronouns I want, whenever I want. They call that violence now. I just laugh. I like to laugh.
@ErebusValmar @CamiloS27367449 @pax Do you not use pronouns? How do you feel about adjectives?
@H2OAcidic @pax @PAXEastNews You are a champion and a scholar.  Thank you.
